alert.note: Alert for Fairbanks Metro Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 6:11AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Very Warm Temperatures Today... Temperatures between 20 and 30 above can be expected across the area today, with windy conditions over hills. There is a slight chance of freezing of very light freezing rain this morning as well. Road conditions will likely become slippery with the warming temperatures today. Temperatures are expected to cool back closer to normal tonight and Monday. A very strong storm near Anchorage will move north over the Central Interior this morning and to the Northern Interior this afternoon. This storm is bringing strong chinook winds and warm air to the Southeast Interior this morning along with a slight chance of light freezing rain. The winds will decrease late today and temperatures will cool back towards normal late tonight.
